797320906167099400,Sat Nov 12 06:11:32 +0000 2016,I love my country. I am all for cleaning up economy. I am for  big ideas,like demonetization. However, I also think execution is  important.

797317547389354000,Sat Nov 12 05:58:11 +0000 2016,To queue for several hours to find an empty ATM for Rs 2,000 of your own money is no fun. Execution of an idea as important as the idea.
797317028340080600,Sat Nov 12 05:56:07 +0000 2016,While demonetization might be well-intentioned, the poor execution such as empty ATMs may lead to a lot of suffering for ordinary citizens.
